_sText: ============================================= The map mg_rotation has 4 modes and 4 songs. All the modes and songs are random every time of spawning. YouÂ´ll get a knife every time of spawning. ============================================= [Mods] *Easy mode enable* (slow rotation) *Medium mode enable* (faster rotation) *Hard mode enable* (faster rotation) *Very hard mode enable* (fastest rotation/lasers enable) ============================================= Check it out!
